Description.Text: The 3-star The Belhaven Hotel offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Glasgow. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, room service, are at hand. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer internet access â€“ wireless, whirlpool bathtub, non smoking rooms, heating, wake-up service to ensure a restful night. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including golf course (within 3 km). Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Glasgow has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at The Belhaven Hotel.
